GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
drm: bridge: adv7511: unregister cec i2c device after cec adapter

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 86ae5170786aea3e1751123ca55700fb9b37b623, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 3b1b975003e4a3da4b93ab032487a3ae4afca7b5. For more details please see the references link.
